This configuration file is for defining the issue templates for the ActivityWatch project on GitHub. It includes links to different channels for different purposes:

1. Feature requests: Link to the forum where users can request and vote on features.
2. Support: Link to the forum where users can ask for help.
3. Discussion (on forum): Link to the forum for general discussions about ActivityWatch.
4. Discussion (on GitHub Discussions): Link to the GitHub Discussions for discussions (testing) but the forum is still preferred.
5. Chat with us on Discord: Link to the Discord server for chatting with the project team.

These links provide users with different channels to engage with the project for various purposes like requesting features, seeking support, discussing topics, or chatting with the project team.
